message.name: ERR_TRIGGERTYPE_FV_WRONGTYPE
message.locale: The trigger type is not valid for an address.

message.name: ERR_CONCERNROLEADDRESSKEY_FV_CASTERROR
message.locale: The record identifier specified is not a ConcernRoleAddressKey.

message.name: ERR_CONCERNROLEADDRESSKEY_FV_NOT_SET
message.locale: The concern role address key has not been set.

message.name: ERR_CONCERNROLEADDRESSID_FV_NOVALUE
message.locale: The concern role address ID has not been specified.

message.name: ERR_ADDRESSDATA_FV_HOUSENUMBER
message.locale: The field house number could not be found.

message.name: ERR_ADDRESSDATA_FV_STREET
message.locale: The field street could not be found.

message.name: ERR_ADDRESSDATA_FV_POSTCODE
message.locale: The field postcode could not be found.

message.name: ERR_ADDRESSDATA_FV_CITY
message.locale: The field city could not be found.

message.name: ERR_ADDRESSDATA_FV_COUNTRY
message.locale: The field country could not be found.
